transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 你好! 我是小美。让我们学习如何在班级里自信地介绍自己。

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: Say: 'Hello everyone, my name is Li Wei'

transcript.speaker: child
transcript.content: Hello everyone, my name is Li Wei

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 太棒了! Very clear and confident!

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: You can also say: 'I like playing football and drawing pictures'

transcript.speaker: child
transcript.content: I like playing football and drawing pictures

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 好棒! Sharing your interests helps make friends!
